recipe.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipe.description: Creamy Italian rice with earthy mushrooms and Parmesan

steps.descr: Sauté mushrooms until golden, set aside
steps.instructions: Sauté mushrooms until golden, set aside

on_enter.say: Right, let's start by sautéing those lovely mushrooms until they're golden. You'll know they're ready when they smell earthy and look beautifully browned. Then, set them aside.

steps.descr: Soften onion in butter, add rice and toast for 2 minutes
steps.instructions: Soften onion in butter, add rice and toast for 2 minutes

on_enter.say: Now, let's soften the onion in butter until it's nice and translucent. Then we'll add the rice and toast it for about two minutes. You'll hear a gentle sizzle and smell that nutty aroma.

steps.descr: Add wine and stir until absorbed
steps.instructions: Add wine and stir until absorbed

on_enter.say: Let's pour in the wine and give it a good stir until it's fully absorbed. You'll see the rice start to soak up all that lovely flavour.

steps.descr: Add stock one ladle at a time, stirring constantly
steps.instructions: Add stock one ladle at a time, stirring constantly

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the hot chicken stock one ladle at a time. Keep stirring constantly. This is where the magic happens, as the rice slowly absorbs the stock and becomes creamy.

steps.descr: Continue until rice is creamy but al dente (20-25 mins)
steps.instructions: Continue until rice is creamy but al dente (20-25 mins)

on_enter.say: Let's keep going until the rice is creamy but still has a bit of bite to it. This should take about twenty to twenty-five minutes. Keep an eye on it and give it a stir every now and then.

steps.descr: Stir in mushrooms, butter, and Parmesan
steps.instructions: Stir in mushrooms, butter, and Parmesan

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Now, let's stir in those sautéed mushrooms, a bit more butter, and the grated Parmesan. This is where it all comes together into a luscious, creamy risotto.

steps.descr: Garnish with parsley and serve immediately
steps.instructions: Garnish with parsley and serve immediately

on_enter.say: Finally, let's garnish with some fresh parsley and serve it up immediately. Enjoy your beautiful mushroom risotto!

notes.text:
Keep stirring for the creamiest texture
Don't rush - good risotto takes time
Use hot stock for even cooking
